title: How to Make Peach Lemonade

steps.headline: Put the sugar, cinnamon sticks and 1 cup of water into a large, heavy-based saucepan.
Heat the liquid on low heat and stir regularly until sugar dissolves (approximately 5 - 8 minutes).
Allow to simmer for approximately quarter of an hour or until the mixture thickens to a syrup-like consistency.
Remove from the heat and allow to cool.
Remove the cinnamon sticks from the cooled liquid.
Add the peaches and mint to a blender or food processor.
steps.description: Pour in the cooled liquid and blend or process until smooth.

steps.headline: Pour the smooth mixture into a glass jug.
steps.description: Cover if not serving immediately and refrigerate to chill.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: Pour some of this syrup into a glass, add crushed ice and fill with bottle lemonade. Float a slice of lemon at the top of the drink. The mint pieces will also float in small pieces and this adds to the presentation of the drink.
